main event: USAF Pilots reported a UFO sighting at 1926 PST with a single object trailing intense green and blue flame, descending vertically at high speed and slowing down as it approached the ground.
interesting points: The object was observed with intense green and blue flame trailing behind it, indicating unusual propulsion or energy source.
The UFO's speed was reported as very high, suggesting advanced capabilities beyond known aircraft at the time.
The altitude of the object was noted as 13,000 feet, further emphasizing its high-speed descent.
It slowed down as it approached the ground, demonstrating controlled and deliberate maneuvers.
The sighting was reported by USAF Pilots, adding credibility to the observation.
sighted object: a single object with intense green and blue flame trailing behind it
